parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions "Alfred Laurentiu Mihai" and identifies him as a "Senator PSD - jud. Ilfov".  This clearly refers to a specific parliamentary candidate from the PSD party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The large reach estimate (">1M") further supports this.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post's objective is to increase awareness and potentially support for Alfred Laurentiu Mihai, a candidate in the parliamentary elections. The use of his title ("Senator") and party affiliation ("PSD") directly relates to his electoral campaign. The "Like Page" CTA further reinforces this objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post does not present information in a journalistic manner. It lacks objectivity and is clearly promotional in nature, focusing solely on promoting the candidate.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece for a political candidate.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>789982992533253</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes Alfred Laurentiu Mihai, a PSD senator candidate.  It directly names him, states his party affiliation, and includes a call to action ("Like Page").  The paid nature of the advertisement and its significant reach indicate an intention to influence voters. While the post itself doesn't explicitly urge people to vote for him, its promotional nature and targeting during the election period strongly suggest it constitutes electoral propaganda.  The image shows a formal meeting, which could be interpreted as an attempt to portray the candidate as serious and competent.  The lack of a CMF number is not a decisive factor, as the other elements strongly suggest a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate>
    <name>Alfred Laurentiu Mihai</name>
    <impact>POSITIVE</impact>
  </candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Alfred Laurentiu Mihai], pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei reclame plătite pe Facebook cu ID-ul 789982992533253, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Alfred Laurentiu Mihai, menționându-l explicit ca Senator PSD - jud. Ilfov, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestuia.  Postarea, prin conținutul său și amploarea distribuției (peste 1 milion de potențiali vizualizări), depășește limitele activității jurnalistice și are ca obiectiv clar promovarea electorală a candidatului, îndeplinind astfel toate condițiile din articolul 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
